name: change-column-settings
description: Change column formatting settings on a chart. `column_settings` is the list of current column formatting settings, where `key` is an identifier of the column and `column_title` is a user visible name of the column.

column_settings.description: A list of modified `column_settings`. Include only modified items from `column_settings`.

key.description: Key of the column exactly as in `column_settings`.

column_title.description: The new column title. If no column title change was requested, set this parameter to `null`.
